sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form-wizard
    title="New Submission"
    subtitle="Please complete below to submit your entry"
    @on-complete="submitEntry"
    color="#1FC3A7"
  >
    <tab-content title="Personal details">
      <create-entry-stepper-scar-info :wizard-data="form.scarInfo"></create-entry-stepper-scar-info>
    </tab-content>
    <tab-content ref="posasTab" title="Self Assesment">
      <create-entry-stepper-posas :wizard-data="form.posas"></create-entry-stepper-posas>
    </tab-content>
    <tab-content title="Provide an Image">
      <create-entry-stepper-image-upload :wizard-data="form"></create-entry-stepper-image-upload>
    </tab-content>
  </form-wizard>
</template>

<script>
import { FormWizard, TabContent } from "vue-form-wizard";
import "vue-form-wizard/dist/vue-form-wizard.min.css";
import CreateEntryStepperPosas from "@/components/CreateEntryStepperPosas";
import CreateEntryStepperImageUpload from "@/components/CreateEntryStepperImageUpload";
import CreateEntryStepperReviewCard from "@/components/CreateEntryStepperReviewCard";
import CreateEntryStepperScarInfo from "@/components/CreateEntryStepperScarInfo";
import {
  CREATE_SCAR_MUTATION,
  UPDATE_DEMOGRAPHICS_MUTATION
} from "@/graphql/mutations";
import { ME_QUERY } from "@/graphql/queries";

export default {
  components: {
    FormWizard,
    TabContent,

    CreateEntryStepperPosas,
    CreateEntryStepperImageUpload,
    CreateEntryStepperReviewCard,
    CreateEntryStepperScarInfo
  },

  data: () => {
    return {
      me: {},
      form: {
        posas: {
          posas_q1: null,
          posas_q2: null,
          posas_q3: null,
          posas_q4: null,
          posas_q5: null,
          posas_q6: null,
          posas_q7: null
        },
        scarInfo: {
          scarDate: null,
          causes: null,
          selected: null,
          conditions: null
        },
        image: null
      }
    };
  },

  apollo: {
    me: {
      query: ME_QUERY
    }
  },

  methods: {
    async submitEntry() {
      const posasScore = Object.values(this.form.posas).reduce(
        (curr, prev) => curr + prev,
        0
      );
      this.$Progress.start();

      // create news scar
      await this.$apollo
        .mutate({
          mutation: CREATE_SCAR_MUTATION,
          variables: {
            ...this.form.scarInfo,
            bodySites: this.form.scarInfo.selected.map(el => el.id),
            image: this.form.image,
            date: new Date(this.form.scarInfo.scarDate),
            addedAt: new Date(),
            posasScore
          }
        })
        .then(() => {
          this.$Progress.finish();
          this.$toast.open({
            message: "New entry added successfully!",
            type: "is-success",
            position: "is-bottom"
          });
          this.$router.replace("/");
        })
        .catch(() => {
          this.$Progress.fail();
          this.$toast.open({
            message: "Please fill out all fields.",
            type: "is-danger",
            position: "is-bottom"
          });
        });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
